title: Montana Legislature Approves Outright Ban of TikTok
description: The bill, which would make the state the first to ban the social media app, now goes to the desk of Gov. Greg Gianforte.

title: Inside the Hunt for the Discord Leaker, and Twitter Chaos Updates
description: How Times journalists tracked down the alleged leaker of top secret military intelligence.

title: On the TikTok Beat, Trends Dance With National Security
description: Amid talk of a nationwide ban, a reporter discussed the future for TikTok and its Chinese owner, ByteDance, in the United States.
